Package database

Class Dao

java.lang.Object
database.Dao
public class Dao extends Object
Dao class connects the simulator to the database.

  • Method Details

    • incrementSimId

      public void incrementSimId()
      Increments the simulation id. The increments start from 1.

    • getSimId

      public int getSimId()
      Gets the latest simulation id from the database.
      Returns:
      The simulation id.

    • getSimTimestampById

      public Date getSimTimestampById(int id)
      Returns the timestamp of the simulation.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the specific simulation.
      Returns:
      The timestamp of the simulation

    • getSimTimestamps

      public Map<Integer,Long> getSimTimestamps()
      Function made to get all simulation timestamps along with their ids.
      Returns:
      A hashmap with the time stamps.

    • getStaticResultsById

      public HashMap<String,Double> getStaticResultsById(int id)
      Is used to display static results.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the specific results.
      Returns:
      The static results.

    • getDynamicResultsById

      public TreeMap<String,Double> getDynamicResultsById(int id)
      Is used to display dynamic results.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the specific results.
      Returns:
      The dynamic results.

    • addServicePoint

      public void addServicePoint(double simulationTime, int readyCustomers, int ticketCustomers, int wristbandCustomers, int unreadyCustomers, double ticketBoothAverage, int totalTicketCount, double wristbandAverageTime, double ticketAverageTime, double wholeAverageTime, double ticketWristbandTimeRatio)
      Adds a service point to the database.
      Parameters:
      simulationTime - The amount of time the simulation took.
      readyCustomers - Customers that are ready.
      ticketCustomers - Amount of customers that use tickets.
      wristbandCustomers - Amount of customers that have a wristband.
      unreadyCustomers - Customers that were not ready at the end of simulation.
      ticketBoothAverage - How many times do ticket customers go to the ticket booth.
      totalTicketCount - The total amount of tickets.
      wristbandAverageTime - The average visit time of wristband customers.
      ticketAverageTime - The average visit time of ticket customers.
      wholeAverageTime - The average visit time of all customers.
      ticketWristbandTimeRatio - The ratio ticket customers time spend to wristband customers time spend.

    • addRide

      public void addRide(int rideId, int count, double averageServeTime, double averageWaitTime, double variance, double mean)
      Adds a ride to the database.
      Parameters:
      rideId - Which ride of the specific simulation.
      count - How many times the ride gets used.
      averageServeTime - The average service time of the ride.
      averageWaitTime - The average waiting time for a customer.
      variance - The variance of the ride.
      mean - The mean of the ride.

    • addTicketBooth

      public void addTicketBooth(int count, int ticketBoothId, double averageServiceTime, double averageQueueTime)
      Adds a ticket booth to the database.
      Parameters:
      count - How many times the ticket booth is used.
      ticketBoothId - Which ticket booth we are talking about in this specific simulation
      averageServiceTime - The average service time of the booth.
      averageQueueTime - The average queue time of the booth.

    • addRestaurant

      public void addRestaurant(int count, double averageServiceTime, double averageQueueTime, int capacity)
      Adds a restaurant to the database.
      Parameters:
      count - How many customers used the restaurant.
      averageServiceTime - The average service time of the restaurant.
      averageQueueTime - The average queue time of the restaurant.
      capacity - The capacity of the restaurant.
